title: Bad Image Error, How do I deal with this?
body: It says that the riot launcher is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error, it worked perfectly yesterday with no problems. I tried to re-install it and yet it still doesn't work. The error status is 0xc000012f. Thanks for the help.

replies.body:
I've never heard of this error before. I'd recommend running league as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) in case this was caused by League not having the correct permissions to access specific files. If this didn't resolve the issue, I'd configure League to run in compatibility with Windows 7 using [**this guide.**](https://www.windows10forums.com/articles/compatibility-mode.7/)

Let me know if this resolved your issue or not.
